overview: The time of destiny has come for Ryo Hazuki and his mysterious new travelling companion, Shen Hua. The evil Chiyoumen are about to unleash the final phase of their sinister plan, and only Ryo and his friends stand in their way. Ancient prophecies are fulfilled, legendary evils are unleashed, and painful sacrifices are made as the saga comes to a stunning conclusion!
title: Shenmue III - The Gang Edition
